dsOverview.title: MEDS Observed Wave Data

summary.p: Data from Canadian buoys through Nov. 1998, data from two NOAA buoys now operated by Canada, and data from three Canadian waverider buoys.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: CA/DFO/MEDS > Marine Environmental Data Service, Fisheries and Oceans, Canada
